ThingDef.label: Book of Tynan Religion
ThingDef.description: Ancient monoteistic religion's The God is almighty Tynan, creator of all being in the world. History says, Tynan created all from nothing, made energy from himself, made planets from his bones, his breath burned suns, his tears filled up seas and oceans. And from his flesh he made all the creatures alive.

ThingDef.description: Peaceable religion tells about world love, help and praising the Sun. Followers of this religion are kind and they bring the wisdom of the ages about mercy and repentance like The Great Mother who helped others to know this world.
